instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
直走經過左手邊的Puget Systems、RapidPipeline、Wacom Technology，約 3 個攤位。
直走經過左手邊的Wacom Technology。
目的地就在前方的 International Computer Computer Concepts。

companies.name: International Computer Concepts
companies.description: For over 25 years International Computer Concepts (ICC) has been a leading specialized technology systems integrator with broad expertise in standard and customized server, workstations, storage, and networking solutions for a wide variety of industries and markets.
